item.title: How can i join a server!
item.dc:creator: @Rare_z Rare z
item.description:
@Rare_z wrote:

The second reply was right.

  1. After downloading and extracting MoparScape, click “runMoparScape”
  2. Wait for it.
  3. Click “Enter”
  4. Type in the Username and password
  5. Type the server (no-ip) or hamachi.
  6. Click “login”
  7. There you go. If it says “Error connecting to server. Must be down” this is either because the server is down or dosen’t exist.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Pwnag3 Pur3 Pwnag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Pwnag3 wrote:

ok go to dodian.com and look at the servers page. and then on the mopar login page click file in the top lefty hand corner and click new server. enter the ip u of the server that u found/want and click ok and click enter and enter any username or pass and viola! oh and ip’s like eyrescape.no-ip.org arent websites there ips

item.title: How can i join a server!
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Pwnag3 Pur3 Pwnag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Pwnag3 wrote:

^^^^^^^^^^
wrong lol

1.Run MoparScape
2.Click on File in the top left corner
3.Click New Server
4. Enter a server IP (can find on Server advertisment oh and things like eyrescape.no-ip.org are ip’s not websites, lol)
5.Press enter
6.Make up any username and pass and Login!

item.dc:creator: @Run_From_Aut Run From Aut
item.description:
@Run_From_Aut wrote:

stepped guide to doing something on MS.

1). Run Moparscape.
2). Press enter, then type ( actualy move ) a server ( such as 127.0.0.1 )
3). Username And Password ~ Login

guide by Run From Aut. :eek:
